name: Conjurer
proficiencies: Saving Throw: INT +6 | Saving Throw: WIS +4 | Skill: Arcana +6 | Skill: History +6

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The conjurer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The conjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after the Conjurer Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher).
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the conjurer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

actions.name: Dagger.
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
